name: Dessert on a vegan island
description:
You are a muffin stranded on an island and you try to get your toilet paper back.

You move with arrow keys.

You interact with things with X key.

You go to menu with Enter.

All original graphics and their licenses are listed here: https://github.com/basxto/doavi#licensing

This game is completely open source: https://github.com/basxto/doavi
